About Me

I am a Computer Science student pursuing my Bachelor's degree from FAST University, Islamabad, with a strong passion for leveraging programming to solve real-world problems. My interest lies in full-stack development, with a specific focus on MERN stack development, where I specialize in constructing responsive and user-friendly web applications. I am dedicated to advance my abilities in this field, with an attempt to constantly gain knowledge through various courses and certifications.
